subject: Revision of consolidated emoluments payable to the Short-term contract employees in NHAI engaged through agency.

In supersession of Office Order No. NHAI/I1041/01/2000-Admn dated 31,10.2013 and corrigendum dated 09.04.2015, it has been decided that the consolidated emoluments payable to the short term contract employees engaged through agency will be aS under: SL Consolidated Emoluments" Name of post No: (In Rs.) per month (a) Stenographer 21,840/ - (b) Accountant 24,500/ - (c) Office Assistant 16,640/- Id) Peon 7,722/- (e) Chowkidar 7,7221 - (f) Safaiwala (Part Time) 3,861/- *as per Policy Circular no. NHAII 1041/01/2000-Admn(Pt) dated 31.10.2013, 2 The above mentioned consolidated emoluments Or the minimum wages of concerned State Government, whichever Is higher; may be to the short term contract employees engaged through agency. 3 The other contents of the office order No.NHAV/I1041/01/2000-Admn dated 31.10.2013 will remain unchanged: 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. (Ram Ashraya Singh) DGM (HR & Admn-III) To, AII ROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site offices Copy to; PS to Chairman PS to All Members/CVO (i_) CGM (HR & Admn) (iv) GM (HR-I) & GM (HR-III) (v) Manager (Fin)/DDO (vi) Librarian (vii) Hindi officer Csom MRAL paid
